title: PCDJ.DEX.DJ.1.0.7228-MKDEV.TEAM
description:
PCDJ.DEX.DJ.1.0.7228-MKDEV.TEAM


Read the nfo         seed/enjoy




PCDJ DEX description
Mix your favorite tracks like a pro DJ and record the output audio

PCDJ DEX is a computer mixing program for both beginning and professional DJ's.

Mix your mp3, ogg, wma, flac, wav files or audio cd's easily on any configuration. PCDJ DEX is all you need to get started and become a DJ!

Each deck has a pitch slider with a selectable range from +-8% up to +-100% You can pre-listen to the song using headphones through the rear-out of your 3d-soundcard, with a second sound card, by splitting left and right channels or by using ASIO drivers.

PCDJ DEX has a very advanced BPM detection that will help you synchronize your tracks. It's very easy to set a cue-point and start your song exactly wher you want. PCDJ DEX makes beat-matching two tracks easier by using the virtual record in order to speed a song up or down.

For all of the PCDJ, old school customers, you'll love the Classic Red 5.2 Mode! Complete with the original Red 5.2 skin. You can even import your old Red 5.2 recordcase!

Here are some key features of "PCDJ DEX":

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Play mp3, wma, ogg, flac, wav, or directly from a CD
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Change pitch with 4 different ranges from +/-8% to +/-100%
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Change volume, play and pause (instant-start) with low latency (up to 2ms with ASIO, up to 10ms with DirectSound)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Edit ID3v2 tags for mp3's and the ogg vorbis tag for ogg files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Fast and accurate automatic BPM detection
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Pre-Listening
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Through Soundcard rear-out
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Through Left/Right splitter or
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Through Second Soundcard
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Mix on an external mixer
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Player 1 to Front Out, Player 2 to Rear Out or
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Player 1 to Soundcard 1, Player 2 to Soundcard 2
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DirectSound or ASIO output
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Spectrum analyzer, stereo VU Meter

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Record your mix in mp3, wave or ogg format
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Create your own skins with PCDJ DEX advanced skinning system
Separate BPM Analyzer to batch analyze your complete music library:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Effects (on each deck)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 3-band equalizer with on the fly changeable frequencies
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Echo/Sampler/Looping
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Create echo effect, high pass and low pass filter available on echoed sound
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Echo/Loop time configurable up to 8 beats
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Volume of buffer and source both configurable
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Easy looping with shortcut keys
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Flanger
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Automatic or Manual
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Configurable Strength
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Compressor/Normalizer
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Gapper effect
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Filter effect
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Bitcrusher
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Automatic 0dB limiter to prevent clipping
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Tempo Control: Change speed without changing pitch, or change pitch without changing speed
Load up to 2 custom VST effects simultaneously on each deck:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Mixer
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Crossfader with 4 different fade-curves, and configurable slope
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Spectrum Analyzer, stereo VU meter
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Limiter to prevent clipping
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Output samplerate up to 96kHz/16-bit for DirectSound and 96kHz/32-bit for ASIO
VST effect possible on main output as well:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· External Hardware Supported
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· External analog mixer supported
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· PCDJ DAC-3
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DENON DN-HC4500

Any MIDI controller:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Playlist/Music Browser/Recordcase
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Easily navigate through your music directories
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Shows all tracks based on id3v1, id3v2 and ogg tag information (title, BPM, length, ?)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Sort your music in crates

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Minimum
